Producer: Tyler Levine, Michael McGowan, Patrice Theroux
Production Co: Carousel Pictures, Sugar Shack Productions, Mulmur Feed Co. Production
Synopsis: Based on Miriam Toews' best-selling novel, All My Puny Sorrows unexpectedly infuses wry humor into this heart-wrenching story of two loving sisters: one a gifted pianist (Sarah Gadon) obsessed with ending her life, the other a struggling writer (Alison Pill) who, in wrestling with this decision, makes profound discoveries about herself.
Title: All My Puny Sorrows
